Name: Final Reverberation II
Description: You hand the “treasure” taken from the kids to I.R.I.S. The system analysis reveals it's connected to a missing professor. You decide to look deeper.
QuestDesc: You hand the “treasure” taken from the kids to I.R.I.S. The system analysis reveals it's connected to a missing professor. You decide to look deeper.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lias
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: {PlayerName}, thank you for what you did for us before. You are someone I can trust, so...

Dialogues.Speaker: Lias
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: There are two things I want to give you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lias
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: A professor who stayed with us for a while left these with me.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lias
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Come to think of it, he shared with us some very practical knowledge and technology. The younger ones at camp all held him in high regard.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lias
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: He asked me to give these to someone from the Academy. But only to someone I trusted.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lias
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I figured he must've been studying the Void Storm. He was always getting too close to it for comfort.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lias
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes... the Storm took him. By the time we got to him, he was almost gone... He threw his Cassette and recorder to us right before it was too late.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lias
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We could not make out his last words at all.

Dialogues.Speaker: Lias
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I think when he threw these, he was desperate to get something important through to the Collective.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'll take them. I promise I'll bring these back to the Academy and keep the professor's cassette safe in the Archives.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The professor... did rush toward death. But not because wanted it...

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The system shouldn't label his ending as a suicide.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I need to tell I.R.I.S. the truth!

Dialogues.Speaker: I.R.I.S.
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Are you all right, {PlayerName}? You seem somewhat...

Options.PlotLineKey: His death shouldn't have been ruled a suicide.

Dialogues.Speaker: I.R.I.S.
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: To clarify, the Academy never officially classified the professor's death as suicide. It was only theorized.

Dialogues.Speaker: I.R.I.S.
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: However... A conclusion has been reached today. A student discovered key information.

Dialogues.Speaker: I.R.I.S.
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The moment you uploaded the data from the Cassette Depository, my system was notified.

Dialogues.Speaker: I.R.I.S.
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Would you like to see Professor Sestan's complete report?

Dialogues.Speaker: I.R.I.S.
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Retrieving relevant data on Professor Sestan. Professor Sestan and his assistant droid went missing during a scientific expedition.

Dialogues.Speaker: I.R.I.S.
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: According to witnesses, Professor Sestan left the campsite with the droid after midnight, without a word, and they were never seen again.

Dialogues.Speaker: I.R.I.S.
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Later, the Academy searched the professor's quarters and discovered what appeared to be a suicide note.

Dialogues.Speaker: I.R.I.S.
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The letter was filled with the professor's frustration and despair regarding his research career.

Dialogues.Speaker: I.R.I.S.
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It was evident that the professor experienced significant confusion in his field and even crossed certain ethical boundaries.

Dialogues.Speaker: I.R.I.S.
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: However, a student later discovered that the professor continued his academic work after his disappearance, even if his only motivation was to reclaim a sense of meaning in his death.

Dialogues.Speaker: I.R.I.S.
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: In the end, he was able to rediscover the most fundamental principle of science— to treat all life as equal, even that of a mech reindeer.

Dialogues.Speaker: I.R.I.S.
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This is an undisputed fact.

Dialogues.Speaker: I.R.I.S.
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: To conclude, I.R.I.S. and the Startorch Academy have reached a consensus—Professor Sestan gave his life for science.

Dialogues.Speaker: I.R.I.S.
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Academy expresses its deepest condolences for Professor Sestan's passing during his research...

Options.PlotLineKey: You're one of the good ones, Classmate I.R.I.S..

Dialogues.Speaker: I.R.I.S.
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No need to thank or compliment me. I'm simply stating known facts.

Dialogues.Speaker: I.R.I.S.
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I cannot influence how others judge Professor Sestan. The reason he received this evaluation...

Dialogues.Speaker: I.R.I.S.
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...Is simply because he was, in himself, a person worthy of such description.
